AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone arrow
AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone is attached as an arrow head. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel arrow
AmmoCategoryDef.description: The arrow head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel arrow
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a plasteel head to maximize armor penetration.
